prompts: Show me a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky design and autumn colors.
Create a pumpkin-inspired Pokemon that embodies the spirit of Halloween.
Imagine a Pokemon that's part plant and part ghost, with vibrant seasonal colors.
Design a spooky creature that lives in the woods and has a playful personality.
Generate a unique ghost-type Pokemon that has a round, bag-like body and long arms.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a living lantern with a mysterious aura.
Give me a creature that blends ghostly elements with nature for a haunting effect.

distinctive_features: Face with carved features resembling a jack-o'-lantern
